front.title: VRRP Operation over ATM LAN Emulation

abstract.t: This memo specifies the application of the Virtual Router RedundancyProtocol (VRRP) over networks built using the ATM Forum LAN Emulationprotocol (LANE). The memo specifies the behavior required of a LANEclient (LEC) in order to interoperate with VRRP.Two schemes 'Proxy LEC Scheme' and 'Non-Proxy LEC Scheme' areoutlined for running VRRP over LANE. Both schemes can be deployedsimultaneously in the network.
